Tips for Intermediate Grammar

Connect the Concepts

At the intermediate level, look for connections between different grammar topics.

Read Extensively

Reading helps you see grammar in context and reinforces patterns naturally.

Practice Writing

Try to incorporate intermediate grammar structures in your writing practice.

Focus on Exceptions

Pay special attention to irregularities and exceptions to the rules.
